forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
